item.title: McDonald’s sees wider margins ahead as same-store-sales surprise offsets a profit miss
item.description: McDonald’s stock rose 5% as investors latched on to the positive developments, despite some mixed results from the fast-food giant.

item.title: How Trump’s tariff fight could backfire on U.S. stock and bond investors
item.description: In Trump’s first term, American businesses cut investment spending and industrial production slowed.

item.title: ‘They are as different as day and night’: My son is upset that his brother got more financial support. Now it’s payback time. What should I do?
item.description: “My son feels that he has done everything to save us money and that he is not getting his fair share.”

item.title: Gold could hit $3,000 soon and $4,000 in 2026, this market pro says. Here’s why.
item.description: Yardeni: Inflation, tariffs, plus countries accumulating gold as a haven from U.S. sanctions.

item.title: This chart shows the dramatic shift in global manufacturing over 30 years. The U.S. isn’t at the top.
item.description: China is at the heart of longer-term economic security concerns that could keep global trade conflicts going, says Deutsche Bank.
